title: Butterfly (troll)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Butterfly is a troll found in the troll town of Weiss. During Making Friends with My Arm, he, along with the rest of the Weiss trolls, attempts to knock the player out by throwing rocks at them when they first sneak in the town.

NPC ID8456,8459

Butterfly is a troll found in the troll town of Weiss. During Making Friends with My Arm, he, along with the rest of the Weiss trolls, attempts to knock the player out by throwing rocks at them when they first sneak in the town.
